summary.para: Retrieves the data stream of the file's content.

param.name: pVal
param.para: An IStream interface of the contents of the file.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

remarks.para: The contents of the file becomes read-only once the file item is added to file system image.

summary.para: Retrieves the number of bytes in the file.

param.name: pVal
param.para: Size, in bytes, of the file.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

summary.para: Retrieves the most significant 32 bits of the property.

param.name: pVal
param.para: Most significant 32 bits of the property.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

remarks.para: This property and together provide the size of the file as two 32-bit numbers for languages that do not support 64-bit values, such as VBScript and Visual Basic 6.

summary.para: Retrieves the least significant 32 bits of the property.

param.name: pVal
param.para: Least significant 32 bits of the property.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

remarks.para: This property and together provide the size of the file as two 32-bit numbers for languages that do not support 64-bit values, such as VBScript and Visual Basic 6.

summary.para: Sets the data stream of the file's content.

param.name: newVal
param.para: An IStream interface of the content of the file to add to the file system image.

returns.para: S_OK is returned on success, but other success codes may be returned as a result of implementation. The following error codes are commonly returned on operation failure, but do not represent the only possible error values:

description.para: FileSystemImage object is in read only mode.

remarks.para: The contents of the file becomes read-only once the file item is added to file system image.

summary.para: Use this interface to identify the file size and data stream of the file contents.
To get this interface, call the method.

remarks.para: Data streams for files contained within the file system image are read-only. File data can only be replaced by overwriting an existing file item.
This is an FsiFileItem object in script.
